definitions.definition: A restatement of a text in different words , often to clarify meaning or from memory rather than verbatim .
One of a certain number of Scripture passages turned into verse for use in the service of praise .

main_definition: A restatement of a text in different words , often to clarify meaning or from memory rather than verbatim .
secondary_definitions: ( Scotland ) One of a certain number of Scripture passages turned into verse for use in the service of praise .
